trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定本地计算机，使用上是否存在日志<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须在本地计算机，则具有相应的注册表权限否则为<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>将引发。

trans-unit.source: To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜索的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。

trans-unit.source: A service that is executing under the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem> account does not have the privileges required to execute this method.
trans-unit.target: 在下执行服务<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem>帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>, and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因为你无法为新的源的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>以确保源指定的名称与`source`本地计算机上尚不存在。

trans-unit.source: The `source` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `source`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> was not found, but some or all of the event logs could not be searched.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 <paramref name="source" />，无法搜索部分或全部事件日志。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name the computer on which to look, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其上查看的计算机的名称，对于本地计算机则为“.”。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event source is registered on a specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 确定事件源是否已在指定的计算机上注册。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event source is registered on the given computer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件源已在给定计算机上注册，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于确定指定的计算机上是否存在事件源`machineName`参数。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a log exists on the specified computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定使用指定的计算机上是否存在日志<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the given server; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法访问注册表，你必须在给定的服务器中; 上具有相应的注册表权限否则为<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>将引发。

trans-unit.source: To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜索的事件源在 Windows Vista 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。

trans-unit.source: A service that is executing under the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem> account does not have the privileges required to execute this method.
trans-unit.target: 在下执行服务<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount.LocalSystem>帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>, and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 因为你无法为新的源的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>以确保源指定的名称与`source`计算机上尚不存在。

trans-unit.source: The `source` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `source`和`machineName`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A> 是`static`方法，使其可以调用类本身上。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要创建的实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the source `MySource` on the computer `MyServer`, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建源`MySource`计算机上`MyServer`，和一个项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="machineName" /> is an invalid computer name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 是无效的计算机名称。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> was not found, but some or all of the event logs could not be searched.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 <paramref name="source" />，无法搜索部分或全部事件日志。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls issued as a result of an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> entry written event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于封送事件处理程序调用的对象，该调用在有 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 项写入事件时发出。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> used to marshal event-handler calls issued as a result of an <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten" /> event on the event log.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" />，用于封送由事件日志上的 <see cref="E:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten" /> 事件引发的事件处理程序调用。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A> is `null`, methods handling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event are called on a thread from the system thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A>是`null`，方法处理<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件调用从系统线程池线程上。

trans-unit.source: For more information on system thread pools, see <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>.
trans-unit.target: 系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a button, accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or might result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件由 visual Windows 窗体组件，如按钮，通过系统线程池访问组件可能无法工作，或可能导致的异常处理。

trans-unit.source: Avoid this by setting <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A> to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods handling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event to be called on the same thread on which the component was created.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置来避免这<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A>到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致处理的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A> is automatically set to the control containing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>在内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A>自动设置为控件包含<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you place an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A> property of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> is set to the instance of Form1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你将放置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>form1 设计器上 (其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>)<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SynchronizingObject%2A>属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>被设置为 form1 的实例。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将项写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入事件日志的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Writes an information type entry, with the given message text, to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将信息类型项与给定的消息文本一起写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an information entry to the event log associated with this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法与此关联的事件日志中写入信息项<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify any other <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>, use a different overload of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定任何其他<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>，使用的不同重载<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器会将其视为插入字符串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址只能包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>组件之前可以将条目写入日志。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置新的源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>此属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>写入你的组件，在计算机上未注册实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>并注册源。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> for your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance before you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>为你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例然后才能调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统需要注册<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>未上设置属性你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例，该日志将默认为应用程序日志。

trans-unit.source: Many of the exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 许多上面列出的异常由错误生成的注册过程中发生<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法直接写入事件日志将写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来写入事件时使用本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是你所预期如果远程计算机未在运行.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志的消息中。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将项写入事件日志`MyNewLog`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 属性尚未设置。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The method attempted to register a new event source, but the computer name in <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该方法尝试注册新的事件源，但 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName" /> 中的计算机名称无效。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The source is already registered for a different event log.
trans-unit.target: 已为其他事件日志注册了该源。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The message string is longer than 31,839 bytes (32,766 bytes on Windows operating systems before Windows Vista).
trans-unit.target: 消息字符串长于 31,839 字节（在 Windows Vista 之前，在 Windows 操作系统上为 32,766 字节)。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.
trans-unit.target: 此源名称导致注册表项路径的长度超过 254 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志的注册表项未能打开。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将事件项写入事件日志时，操作系统报告了一个错误。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Windows 错误代码不可用。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入事件日志的字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Writes an error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit entry with the given message text to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将错误、警告、信息、成功审核或失败审核项与给定的消息文本一起写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry of a specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的指定项写入<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>到事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`指示由一个图标和事件查看器日志中的类型列中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器会将其视为插入字符串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址只能包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>组件之前可以将条目写入日志。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置新的源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.

The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.
trans-unit.target: 此源名称导致注册表项路径的长度超过 254 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志的注册表项未能打开。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将事件项写入事件日志时，操作系统报告了一个错误。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Windows 错误代码不可用。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入事件日志的字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The application-specific identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的应用程序特定标识符。

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry with the given message text and application-defined event identifier to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将一个具有给定消息文本和应用程序定义的事件标识符的项写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `eventID` to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法写入与应用程序定义条目`eventID`到事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The `eventID` together with the source uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: `eventID`与源一起唯一地标识事件。

trans-unit.source: Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序可以定义其自己的编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。

trans-unit.source: Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器显示这些字符串值，以帮助用户了解发生的问题和建议采取的操作。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器会将其视为插入字符串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址只能包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the event identifier, you can specify an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 除了事件标识符，还可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>写入到事件日志的事件。

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`指示由一个图标和事件查看器日志中的类型列中的文本。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指示事件类型是否是错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>组件之前可以将条目写入日志。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置新的源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>此属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>写入你的组件，在计算机上未注册实例<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>并注册源。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> for your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance before you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>为你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例然后才能调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统需要注册<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>未上设置属性你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>实例，该日志将默认为应用程序日志。

trans-unit.source: Many exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 上面列出的许多异常由错误生成的注册过程中发生<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法直接写入事件日志将写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来写入事件时使用本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是你所预期如果远程计算机未在运行.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志的消息中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLog" /> 属性尚未设置。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The method attempted to register a new event source, but the computer name in <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该方法尝试注册新的事件源，但 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName" /> 中的计算机名称无效。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The source is already registered for a different event log.
trans-unit.target: 已为其他事件日志注册了该源。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="eventID" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventID" /> 小于零或大于 <see cref="F:System.UInt16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The message string is longer than 31,839 bytes (32,766 bytes on Windows operating systems before Windows Vista).
trans-unit.target: 消息字符串长于 31,839 字节（在 Windows Vista 之前，在 Windows 操作系统上为 32,766 字节)。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.

trans-unit.target: 事件日志的注册表项未能打开。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType" />。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 将事件项写入事件日志时，操作系统报告了一个错误。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Windows 错误代码不可用。

trans-unit.source: for writing the event log information on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入的计算机上的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序在指定计算机上注册时所采用的源。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入事件日志的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Writes an error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit entry with the given message text to the event log, using the specified registered event source.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的注册事件源，将错误、警告、信息、成功审核或失败审核项与给定的消息文本一起写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry of a specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的指定项写入<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>到事件日志中，将源使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源。

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`指示由一个图标和事件查看器日志中的类型列中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器会将其视为插入字符串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址只能包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建并在编写与源的第一个条目之前，配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置新的源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，则必须配置源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法直接写入事件日志将写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来写入事件时使用本地化的消息资源文件。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目，则必须注册两个单独的源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用资源文件，配置一个源，然后使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法来编写使用到事件日志的资源标识符的条目。

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法使用该源的事件日志中直接写入字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志的消息中。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes a warning entry to an event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在本地计算机上，向事件日志中，"MyNewLog"写入警告项。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 值是空字符串 ("")。

The <paramref name="source" /> value is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.
